channel.title: Comments on: An Invisible Project is a Failed Project
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: Hmm, that paraphrase is definitely one dimension, but I want to point out that the reason your marketing the results of the project aren't just for your own gain (and others) they are the return on investment that was attained by the business investing your time. <br /> While I was aiming for several points, I think one point to remember is that if you cannot outline the savings or how your project is supporting the business as it moves forward, you probably shouldn't be doing it. Personal gains (and the types of gains and focus of the PM) from projects are often a reflection of how the project manager is going to manage the project and make decisions.
item.content:encoded:
Hmm, that paraphrase is definitely one dimension, but I want to point out that the reason your marketing the results of the project aren’t just for your own gain (and others) they are the return on investment that was attained by the business investing your time.
While I was aiming for several points, I think one point to remember is that if you cannot outline the savings or how your project is supporting the business as it moves forward, you probably shouldn’t be doing it. Personal gains (and the types of gains and focus of the PM) from projects are often a reflection of how the project manager is going to manage the project and make decisions.

item.title: By: chaospandion
item.dc:creator: chaospandion
item.description: To paraphrase, learn to market yourself or you'll end up being Joe down the hall. <br /> <br />
item.content:encoded: To paraphrase, learn to market yourself or you’ll end up being Joe down the hall.

item.title: By: Another Programmer
item.dc:creator: Another Programmer
item.content:encoded:
At my last job I didn’t manage to get my project in front of senior executives.

My manager liked my work but when layoffs came I had no supporter in high places. That’s why I’m posting here in the middle of the day.

item.title: By: LNBruno
item.dc:creator: LNBruno
item.description: Dude - you totally nailed my life! Great blueprint! My boss is definitely going to be hearing about/reading this!
item.content:encoded: Dude – you totally nailed my life! Great blueprint! My boss is definitely going to be hearing about/reading this!
